mapper.insert: INSERT INTO my_building ( mem_id, building_name, building_id, road_address, jibun_address, extra_address, climate, residential_type, structure_type, square_meter_area, floors, doors, insulation_level, window_level, ventilation_system, solar_panel_kw, building_img, test_yn, zeb_test_yn ) VALUES ( #{memId}, #{buildingName}, #{buildingId}, #{roadAddress}, #{jibunAddress}, #{extraAddress}, #{climate}, #{residentialType}, #{structureType}, #{squareMeterArea}, #{floors}, #{doors}, #{insulationLevel}, #{windowLevel}, #{ventilationSystem}, #{solarPanelKW}, #{buildingImg} , 'N' , 'N' )
